column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Tenzin says : " Well done kids !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " No .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Welcome home .
#Text=" Korra says : " I missed you , Tenzin .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Now , I hate to get right down to business , but I want to hear what happened in Zaofu .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Way to ruin the moment .
#Text=" Opal says : " Kuvira 's whole army was there .
#Text=She captured Mom , Dad , and my brothers .
#Text=" Korra says : " I thought I was strong enough to stop her .
#Text=I feel like such a failure .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " No one expected you to handle Kuvira on your own .
#Text=It 's up to all of us to find a way to deal with her .
#Text=We 're just glad to have you back .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Where 's Bolin ?
#Text=He 's not still on Kuvira 's side , is he ?
#Text=" Opal says : " I ca n't believe he would stay with her after what she did to my family .
#Text=But we do n't know where he is .
#Text="
